Package com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ElectionNode  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BerkeleyClock
    This class used to represents a clock and be able to change its time without modifying the user system clock.
    CurrentTime
    This class calculates the current time using the calendar class provided in java utils library and return in Hours:Minute:Seconds format
    Database
    Database is a file containing the status of the sensors as a CSV The format of the CSV is: sensorName, status, time This is the format in which the file is written But we are returning only the sensor name and status when read
    DatabaseHandler
    DataBaseHandler acts a client for the gateway and communicates with the Database, thus acting as a bridge for the database and the gateway
    DatabaseHandler.ChatFrame  
    Devices
    Devices class contains the device id and the device name as parameters along with the status of the device.
    DoorSensor
    DoorSensor is the sub-class of Sensor and contains the functionality of the door opened or closed along with communicating with the gateway
    DoorSensor.ChatFrame  
    ElectionDriver
    Class to handle leader election
    GatewayManager
    GatewayManager (stateful server) handles the complete functionality of the Gateway.
    GatewayManager.ChatConnection  
    LightBulb
    This class extends from the Devices
    LightBulbDeviceController
    LightBulbDeviceController acts as client and communicates with the gateway and changes state of LightBulb object if motion detected Also it participates in leader election
    LightBulbDeviceController.ChatFrame  
    LogicalClock
    This class implements the LogicalClock functionality
    MotionSensor
    MotionSensor class is based on push model and extends from Sensor and communicates motion-detection to the gateway.
    MotionSensor.ChatFrame  
    Network
    This class establishes communication over the network.
    Network.ChatMessage  
    Network.DatabaseCommunicator  
    Network.DoorSensorCommunicator  
    Network.GatewayCommunicator  
    Network.LightBulbDeviceCommunicator  
    Network.MotionSensorCommunicator  
    Network.OutletDeviceCommunicator  
    Network.RegisterName  
    Network.TemperatureSensorCommunicator  
    Network.UpdateDataBase  
    Network.UpdateNames  
    Network.UpdateStatus  
    Node  
    Outlet  
    OutletDeviceController
    OutletDeviceController acts as client and communicates with the gateway and changes state of Outlet object if temperature change detected Also participates in leader election
    OutletDeviceController.ChatFrame  
    Sensors
    Sensors contains the basic functionality for Sensor: Takes the Sensor id and name as parameter
    SmartHomesLogger
    Logger file to generate logs
    TemperatureSensor
    TemperatureSensor class is based on push/pull model and extends from Sensor and communicates the temperature to the gateway.
    TemperatureSensor.ChatFrame  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    State
    State is an enum type which keeps the info as On or Off for the devices

    Exception Description
    DeadNodeException
